column4: the package may be contained in another metapackage they reccomend.
huh? I'm a newbie. what do you mean? You may use analogies if you like.

there could be a package called gnome, with all of gnome including games, one called gnome-games, with just the games, and one called like solitaire.. each may include sub-packages also included inother metapackages... make sense
